alert.note: Alert for Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 4:31PM EDT until June 17 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL PENOBSCOT COUNTY... At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Medway, or 9 miles southeast of Millinocket, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... East Millinocket, Medway, Chester, Winn, Woodville, Seboeis, Cedar Lake and West Seboeis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
